pkgmetadata.longdescription: Wrapper for MUMPS Library // Some basic features of MUMPS (MUltifrontal Massively Parallel sparse direct Solver) are wrapped in a Rmumps class. It can be used for storing a sparse matrix and sequentially solving corresponding linear system with one or many right hand sides (in their turn dense or sparse). There is a possibility to do separately symbolic analysis, LU factorization and system solving.
